title: How You Doin?! (Ciera Payton & Morocco Omari)
itunes:title: How You Doin?! (Ciera Payton & Morocco Omari)
description:
Today on the show Charlamagne reunited with Wendy Williams and Kelvin Hunter on the show!!! JUST KIDDING, But we did have the actors that played them in the Wendy Williams LifeTime Movie, where they spoke about the movie, humanizing characters and more. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a Florida officer for slamming a young girl to the ground and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
